unnormalised: Arre yaar, good luck figuring out which GSTIN number belongs to which Sharma ji ki dukaan; it's like trying to find your Aadhaar in a pile of panipuris! My PAN number is etched in my brain but GST no? Total bouncer!
normalised: Arre yaar, good luck figuring out which G-S-T-I-N number belongs to which Sharma ji ki dukaan; it's like trying to find your Aadhaar in a pile of panipuris! My P-A-N number is etched in my brain but G-S-T no? Total bouncer!
